sense.gloss: recently, lately, these days, nowadays, right now
nearly (e.g. "it took nearly one year"), close to
similar, almost the same, close to, nearly
present day, modern times, recent times
early modern period (in Japan, usu. from the Meiji Restoration until the end of World War II)
near oneself, close to one, familiar
neighborhood, neighbourhood, vicinity, environs, surrounding area, district
being not much different, being near (age, skill, etc.)
to approach, to draw near, to get close
to get acquainted with, to get closer to, to get to know
(drawing) near, approaching, almost here, just around the corner
outskirts, environs (of a city), surrounding area, surroundings
recent state, present state, present condition, current status, current circumstances
soon, before long, shortly, in the near future
early modern period (from the Azuchi-Momoyama period to the end of the Edo period)
to bring near, to bring close, to let go near
to associate with, to bring (people) together, to let come near (of a person)
proximity, nearness, being nearby, being adjacent
close associate, close aide, entourage, attendant, retainer
bonding, becoming closer, developing an affinity, familiarity
close relation, close relative, close friend
personal retainer, personal attendant, close aide
Ōmi (former province located in present-day Shiga Prefecture)

sdata.j: それは↑最近↑↓さいきん↓の↑写真↑↓しゃしん↓？
sdata.e: Is it a recent picture?

sdata.j: ↑最近↑↓さいきん↓↑考↑↓かんが↓えることが↑多↑↓おお↓↑過↑↓す↓ぎる。
sdata.e: I have too many things on my mind these days.

sdata.j: ↑私↑↓わたし↓は↑海↑↓うみ↓の↑近↑↓ちか↓くに↑住↑↓す↓んでいるのでよく↑海岸↑↓かいがん↓に↑行↑↓い↓きます。
sdata.e: I live near the sea, so I often get to go to the beach.

sdata.j: ↑飛行機↑↓ひこうき↓が↑乱気流↑↓らんきりゅう↓に↑近付↑↓ちかづ↓いていたため↑操縦↑↓そうじゅう↓↑士↑↓し↓は↑乗客↑↓じょうきゃく↓にシートベルトを↑締↑↓し↓めるよう↑呼↑↓よ↓びかけた。
sdata.e: As the plane was approaching turbulence, the pilot asked the passengers aboard the plane to fasten their seat belts.

sdata.j: ↑最近↑↓さいきん↓↑働↑↓はたら↓きすぎだよ。↑疲↑↓つか↓れてるんじゃない？
sdata.e: You work too hard these days. Aren't you tired?

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓は１↑日↑↓にち↓↑休暇↑↓きゅうか↓をとった↑方↑↓ほう↓がいいだろう、↑最近↑↓さいきん↓↑勉強↑↓べんきょう↓しすぎだから。
sdata.e: You may as well have a day off, because you have been overworking those days.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓の↑誕生↑↓たんじょう↓↑日↑↓び↓が↑近↑↓ちか↓づいているね。
sdata.e: Your birthday is drawing near.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓の↑願↑↓ねが↓いは↑近↑↓ちか↓い↑将来↑↓しょうらい↓↑実現↑↓じつげん↓するだろう。
sdata.e: Your wish will come true in the near future.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓の↑家↑↓いえ↓の↑近↑↓ちか↓くに↑住↑↓す↓めたらいいのに。
sdata.e: I wish I could live near your house.

sdata.j: ↑空港↑↓くうこう↓はすぐ↑近↑↓ちか↓くにあります。
sdata.e: The airport is close at hand.

sdata.j: ↑空港↑↓くうこう↓の↑近↑↓ちか↓くのホテルを↑希望↑↓きぼう↓します。
sdata.e: I prefer a hotel by the airport.

sdata.j: ↑銀行↑↓ぎんこう↓を↑探↑↓さが↓してるんですが、↑近↑↓ちか↓くにありますか。
sdata.e: I'm looking for a bank. Is there one near here?

sdata.j: ↑銀行↑↓ぎんこう↓の↑近↑↓ちか↓くで↑旧友↑↓きゅうゆう↓を↑見↑↓み↓つけた。
sdata.e: I ran across an old friend near the bank.

sdata.j: ↑銀行↑↓ぎんこう↓の↑近↑↓ちか↓くで、↑昔↑↓むかし↓の↑友達↑↓ともだち↓にばったり↑会↑↓あ↓った。
sdata.e: I ran across an old friend near the bank.

sdata.j: ↑銀行↑↓ぎんこう↓の↑近↑↓ちか↓くで↑昔↑↓むかし↓の↑友達↑↓ともだち↓に↑偶然↑↓ぐうぜん↓↑会↑↓あ↓った。
sdata.e: I ran across an old friend near the bank.

sdata.j: ↑近隣↑↓きんりん↓↑諸国↑↓しょこく↓は↑決↑↓けっ↓して↑彼↑↓かれ↓の↑恐怖↑↓きょうふ↓↑政治↑↓せいじ↓に↑屈服↑↓くっぷく↓しなかった。
sdata.e: The neighboring countries never submitted to his terrorism.

sdata.j: ↑近年↑↓きんねん↓↑物価↑↓ぶっか↓が↑徐々↑↓じょじょ↓に↑上↑↓あ↓がっている。
sdata.e: Prices have been gradually rising in recent years.

sdata.j: ↑近年↑↓きんねん↓↑彼↑↓かれ↓らはたびたび↑引↑↓ひ↓っ↑越↑↓こ↓ししている。
sdata.e: In recent years, they have often moved.

sdata.j: ↑近年↑↓きんねん↓↑多↑↓おお↓くのそれぞれの↑地方↑↓ちほう↓の↑伝統↑↓でんとう↓が↑衰微↑↓すいび↓してきている。
sdata.e: Many local traditions have fallen into decay in recent years.

sdata.j: ↑近年↑↓きんねん↓↑科学↑↓かがく↓は↑目覚↑↓めざま↓しく↑進歩↑↓しんぽ↓した。
sdata.e: In recent years, science has made remarkable progress.

sdata.j: ↑近年↑↓きんねん↓の↑旅行↑↓りょこう↓では↑私↑↓わたし↓↑達↑↓たち↓は↑二↑↓に↓、↑三↑↓さん↓↑日↑↓にち↓で↑世界↑↓せかい↓↑一周↑↓いっしゅう↓が↑出来↑↓でき↓る。
sdata.e: Modern travel enables us to go around the world in a few days.

sdata.j: ↑近年↑↓きんねん↓における↑医学↑↓いがく↓の↑進歩↑↓しんぽ↓はめざましい。
sdata.e: Recent advances in medicine are remarkable.

sdata.j: ↑近年↑↓きんねん↓では、↑電子↑↓でんし↓コンピューターがますます↑重要↑↓じゅうよう↓になってきた。
sdata.e: In recent years electronic computers have become increasingly important.

sdata.j: ↑近年↑↓きんねん↓、↑化学↑↓かがく↓は↑驚↑↓おどろ↓くべき↑進歩↑↓しんぽ↓を↑遂↑↓と↓げてきた。
sdata.e: Chemistry has made notable progress in recent years.

sdata.j: ↑近日↑↓きんじつ↓↑中↑↓ちゅう↓に↑来客↑↓らいきゃく↓があるだろう。
sdata.e: We will have some visitors one of these days.

sdata.j: ↑近日↑↓きんじつ↓↑中↑↓ちゅう↓に↑彼女↑↓かのじょ↓にまた↑会↑↓あ↓うことになっている。
sdata.e: I will be seeing her again one of these days.

sdata.j: ↑近道↑↓ちかみち↓を↑行↑↓おこな↓って↑時間↑↓じかん↓のロスを↑埋↑↓う↓め↑合↑↓あ↓わせるつもりだ。
sdata.e: We are going to make up for lost time by taking a short cut.

sdata.j: ↑近道↑↓ちかみち↓をしよう。
sdata.e: Let's take a short cut.

sdata.j: ↑近藤↑↓こんどう↓さんは↑会社↑↓かいしゃ↓で↑一番↑↓いちばん↓↑熱心↑↓ねっしん↓に↑働↑↓はたら↓きます。
sdata.e: Mr Kondo is the most hardworking in his company.

sdata.j: ↑近代↑↓きんだい↓↑的↑↓てき↓↑方法↑↓ほうほう↓で↑産業↑↓さんぎょう↓は↑向上↑↓こうじょう↓した。
sdata.e: Modern methods improved industry.
